channel.title: plasalondon2022 on Sauca Live Light
channel.description: Recent content in plasalondon2022 on Sauca Live Light

item.title: Sauca’s award-winning PLASA Show debut
item.description: Award For Innovation Plasa 2022 Sauca Live Light enjoyed a successful debut at the recent PLASA Show, officially launching as a company and taking home a prestigious PLASA Award for Innovation during the show. The team of independent judges commenting that “this innovation takes control of your phone and provides the next creative chapter for audience participation.” Lighting and Sound Internaional Article
